text:
$EWZS: Felt like there was a lot of potential & hype for rotation into small-caps… but it ended up being Brazilian small-caps. +13% this month. 

$IWM failed to get overbought and peaked relative to $SPX back on June 7th.
author: 161point8

text:
Market notes for 6/29:
- $QQQ $SPY traded pretty much flat yesterday; $IWM saw some demand albeit lighter volume
- Broad stock participation took a beating last week & hasn't recovered much yet this week
- #Copper $HG & #banks $KBE $KRE weak
author: Pat McGrady

text: The breakdown in regional banks, yesterday, was an ominous sign. Coupled with very poor recent relative strength in small-caps, it makes for a problematic environment for stocks -- particularly since a lot of air has come out of the #AI trade/frenzy. $KRE $KBE $IWM
author: Wade Sickler
